\DoxyCodeLine{00011\ \textcolor{keyword}{\ \ \ \ }\{}
\DoxyCodeLine{00012\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ amrex::Real\ d0\ =\ (p1.pos(0)\ -\/\ p2.pos(0));}
